resources.string: UNESCO QUIZ \nHow much do you know about our Worldwide Heritage?
Question No.1: Which country do you believe has the largest area of natural and/or mixed World Heritage sites?
Write the name of the country
Question No.2: How many countries have an area designated as a natural or mixed World Heritage Site, as of 2017?
Question No.3: Which of these sites are one of those who were included at the very first World Heritage list that was made in 1978?
Question No.4: How many World Heritage sites exist in the world, as of 2017?
Question no.5: Which of these sites are included at the 10 most visited World Heritage sites?
